00015 #ifndef BDKADDPDF
00016 #define BDKADDPDF
00017 
00018 #include "TList.h"
00019 #include "RooFitCore/RooArgList.hh"
00020 #include "BToDKTo3piK/BdkPdfComposite.hh"
00021 
00022 class RooRealVar;
00023 class RooAddPdf;
00024 
00025 class BdkPdfSum : public BdkPdfComposite {
00026 public:
00027   // The NameScheme determines how to name the fractions: 
00028   // LAST: fraction name = last + "Frac", where last is the part of the name
00029   //       of the fractions' PDF which follows the last instance of '.' 
00030   //       in the name. So if the PDF's name is "combB0.delta", then the 
00031   //       fractions' name will be "deltaFrac".
00032   // FULL: Same as LAST, but the full name of the PDF is used. In the 
00033   //       example above, this would give "combB0.deltaFrac".
00034   // NUMBER: fraction name = "frac#", where # is the sequential number 
00035   //       of the corresponding PDF, starting at 0.
00036   enum NameScheme {LAST, FULL, NUMBER};
00037 
00038   // Constructors:
00039   BdkPdfSum();
00040 
00041   BdkPdfSum(const char * theName,
00042             const char * theDesc,
00043             BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf1,
00044             BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf2,
00045             NameScheme scheme = LAST,
00046             BdkPdfSum * linkFracs = 0);
00047   
00048   BdkPdfSum(const char * theName,
00049             const char * theDesc,
00050             TList & pdfList,
00051             NameScheme scheme = LAST,
00052             BdkPdfSum * linkFracs = 0);
00053   
00054   virtual ~BdkPdfSum();
00055   
00056   
00057   // Initializers:
00058   void init(const char * theName,
00059             const char * theDesc,
00060             BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf1,
00061             BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf2,
00062             NameScheme scheme = LAST,
00063             BdkPdfSum * linkFracs = 0);
00064   
00065   void init(const char * theName,
00066             const char * theDesc,
00067             TList & pdfList,
00068             NameScheme scheme = LAST,
00069             BdkPdfSum * linkFracs = 0);
00070   
00071 
00072   // Modifiers:
00073   void fixFractions(Bool_t fix = kTRUE);
00074 
00075   // Use the fractions of link. If link==0, makes its own fractions:
00076   void setLinkFracs(BdkPdfSum * link);  
00077 
00078   // Non-const accessors (see also PDF accessors in BdkPdfComposite)
00079   TIterator * fracIter() {return _fractions.createIterator();}
00080   RooRealVar * fraction(int i) {return (RooRealVar *)(_fractions.at(i));}
00081 
00082   RooAddPdf * getAddPdf() {return (RooAddPdf *)getPdf();}
00083 
00084   // Accessors:
00085   int numFractions() const {return numComponents() - 1;}
00086    
00087 
00088 protected:
00089   virtual void createPdf();  
00090   virtual void initParameters();
00091   virtual void makeFracs(BdkPdfSum * linkFracs = 0);
00092   inline RooArgList & fractions() {return _fractions;}
00093 
00094 
00095 private:
00096   BdkPdfSum(const BdkPdfSum &);
00097   BdkPdfSum & operator=(const BdkPdfSum &);
00098 
00099   // Data:
00100   RooArgList _fractions;
00101   BdkPdfSum * _linkFracs;
00102   NameScheme _nameScheme;
00103 
00104   ClassDef (BdkPdfSum,0) // Sum of pdfs wrapper 
00105 
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif
